```{r}
# Time Series Sample

# installation 
install.packages("daltoobox")

# loading DAL
library(daltoolbox) 
```

```{r}
# Series for studying

data(sin_data)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
plot_ts(x=sin_data$x, y=sin_data$y) + theme(text = element_text(size=16))
```

```{r}
# sliding windows

sw_size <- 5
ts <- ts_data(sin_data$y, sw_size)
ts_head(ts, 3)
```

```{r}
# projection

io <- ts_projection(ts)
```

```{r}
# input data
ts_head(io$input)
```

```{r}
# output data
ts_head(io$output)
```
